org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.persistence.file

Class AlignedBuffersDirectFileIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.ignite.internal.processors.cache.persistence.file.AlignedBuffersDirectFileIO
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    AutoCloseable, FileIO

    public class AlignedBuffersDirectFileIO
extends Object
implements FileIO
    Limited capabilities Direct IO, which enables file write and read using aligned buffers and O_DIRECT mode. Works only for Linux
